#summary Ember Media Manager Changelog
#labels Featured

*Changes in Upcoming Release:*
 * Fix for extrathumbs being created even when not utilized
 * Fix for file type sources not loading all movies
 * Fix for incompatible media info
 * Support for MoviePostersDB.com
 * Another attempt to fix Ember not appearing on top when first opened

*Changes in r10:*
 * Disable doublebuffering on main form as a fix to the "black status bar" issue 
 * Ability to open read-only files
 * Changed versioning again. I wrote a powershell script to automatically get the proper version from svn to make it easier on me.
 * Fix for Ember not appearing on top when first opened
 * Fix for IMDB single scraper not working in some instances
 * Fix some elements of the interface not re-enabling after searching IMDB
